description: This file is a configuration script for ESLint, specifically tailored for a Vue.js project using TypeScript and Vitest for testing. It sets up ESLint rules and configurations for the project files, ignores certain directories, and includes plugins for Vue, TypeScript, and Vitest, as well as formatting considerations.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Function to define ESLint configuration with Vue and TypeScript support.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs
methods.description: Object containing various ESLint configurations tailored for Vue with TypeScript.
